Posts.Content: pkbridge wrote: I am 34 my mother has told she has breast cancer - I am hoping to speak to others who can help me help her.  It is hard for me as I am her only son and child and I do not have much understanding of what she is or what she will go thru??? Asking a friend to step in and help me before I can Help her feeling very lonely and uneducated right now !!!! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Mother just told me she has breast cancer I am lost pkbridge jdash
